scenario_text.value:
I’ve started to think I can understand
Kunemon now.
You didn’t before?

Before it was kinda vague, but it’s getting
a lot clearer now.
Wow. You’re finally understanding Kunemon?
Yeah, maybe.

Since he can’t talk, I rely on intuition.
I think my senses are more refined now.
Kewww!
Oh, did you find something again?
All right, let’s see what you’ve got...
You did find something! That’s gonna help!
See what I mean?
(Kunemon sure is incredible!)

(They might be connecting at an emotional
level.)
(Ryo seems happy when Kunemon gets involved.)
(And so...)
That’s great, Kunemon!
It’s thanks to Ryo.
Stop showing off, Ryo.
That’s great, Kunemon!
That’s great, Kunemon! Amazing!
Kewww!
Kunemon? Um, yeah. I guess.
It’s thanks to Ryo.
Well done. It’s thanks to you, Ryo.
What? But it was Kunemon who found it!

But without you, how’d we understand what
Kunemon was saying?

And I think Kunemon might be trying even
harder because of your connection.

Really? I mean, when you put it that way...
It’s not a bad thing, I guess.
Stop showing off, Ryo.
Stop showing off, Ryo.
What?!

You’re always so happy when Kunemon does
stuff.

What are you talking about?
I’m not showing off!
Kewn!
Knock it off. Don’t imitate me!

(Kunemon imitates Ryo? I would never have
known...)

Well, I’m gonna keep looking for clues, so
you can go look somewhere else.
Oh, and take this.
That thing you found before? Thanks.

By the way, Kunemon had one hell of
a reaction below the amusement park.

Things were crazy. I didn’t have time to deal
with it.
(Below the amusement park? What could it be?)

I’m gonna keep looking for clues, so you can
go look somewhere else, too.
